Future features¶

OOP¶

object oriented programming features, such as classes and their functions.

Note

Classes with fields are ready.

Other features¶

Comming soon.

New take ops¶

Note

In version 0.0.2.

operators “<+”, “<-“, “<*”, “</”.:

10 >> age;
age >> out;
# 10
age <+ 1;
age >> out;
# 11
